weapons.title: For all your weapon needs in spy operations

builders.title: Building of evil lairs of all sizes
builders.descr: Provides all megalomaniacs with all required building services from rocket launching faux volcano bases to converted oil rigs.
builders.body:
## Offers ##
- all building services
- self destruct button on all installations
- numerous facilities to provide Bond a painful elaborate death whilst at the same time giving him time to escape

## Benefits ##
- work to tight deadlines on pain of death (piranha fish)
- mobile app to keep track of progress
- disposable henchmen recruited and trained to operate base
